page.title: 20SHOTTS PRISON
page.content: Shotts prison was opened(!) in 1978.It occupies an area of 30 acres. It is an adult long term prison holding prisoners serving sentences of 2 or more years. The accommodation consists of single person cells,each with toilet and washing facilities,centrally heated. The capacity from 1987 will be 540 inmates,and a staff of 300 will be required.Recreation for the prisoners includes television and activities such as table tennis,football and gymnastics.Swimming is at present available at Polmont Prison. Prisoners man a modern laundry which serves Harthill Hospital as well as the prison service. The management philosophy is to provide a liberal training regime.
